attributes.action: reduce the road tax for viehicles running on bio fuels (eg. biodiesel or svo&wvo)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the cost of road tax for all viecles to be lowerd running on biofuels to reflect that its better for the enviroment than running on fossel fuels

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
